Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Checklist Completed occurs in the entire event log
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that are immediately followed by SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed occurring after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Number of SW-Checklist Completed activities that appear in process variants with performance duration above the median
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that occur without a preceding SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days or SW-Checklist Completion now due
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases where 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed compared to the frequency of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing SW-Checklist Completed that proceed to reviewer assignment (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of SW-Checklist Completed activities that are part of variants ending in an acceptance decision (e.g., RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that directly follow Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed in cases where Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission also occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed occurring before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that are followed within 24 hours by SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Ratio of SW-Checklist Completed to Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist'

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-Checklist Completed that include at least one reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed in comparison to Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that occur in the initial phase of the review process (before any AE or EIC decision-related activity)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases where 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' does not happen

Name: Number of SW-Checklist Completed activities performed by SYSTEM as performer
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of performer

Name: Number of SW-Checklist Completed events grouped by case:concept:name to identify repeated checklist completions per manuscript
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Checklist Completed'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
